name: DebugHelper
semantic_context: Causes problems intentionally and generates useful data for debugging
natural_language_description: 这是 DebugHelper 节点。主要用于: Causes problems intentionally and generates useful data for debugging

category.name: category
category.natural_language_description: 参数名: Category | 默认值: throwError
available_options: Throw Error (值: throwError) - Throws an error with the specified type and message
Out Of Memory (值: oom) - Generates a large amount of memory to cause an out of memory error
Generate Random Data (值: randomData) - Generates random data sets

throwErrorType.name: throwErrorType
throwErrorType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Error Type | 默认值: NodeApiError

throwErrorMessage.name: throwErrorMessage
throwErrorMessage.description: The message to send as part of the error
throwErrorMessage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Error Message | 作用: The message to send as part of the error | 默认值: Node has thrown an error

memorySizeValue.name: memorySizeValue
memorySizeValue.description: The approximate amount of memory to generate. Be generous...
memorySizeValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Memory Size to Generate | 作用: The approximate amount of memory to generate. Be generous... | 默认值: 10

randomDataType.name: randomDataType
randomDataType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Type | 默认值: user

nanoidAlphabet.name: nanoidAlphabet
nanoidAlphabet.description: The alphabet to use for generating the nanoIds
nanoidAlphabet.natural_language_description: 参数名: NanoId Alphabet | 作用: The alphabet to use for generating the nanoIds | 默认值: 0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

nanoidLength.name: nanoidLength
nanoidLength.natural_language_description: 参数名: NanoId Length | 作用: The length of each nanoIds | 默认值: 16

randomDataSeed.name: randomDataSeed
randomDataSeed.description: If set, seed to use for generating the data (same seed will generate the same data)
randomDataSeed.natural_language_description: 参数名: Seed | 作用: If set, seed to use for generating the data (same seed will generate the same data)

randomDataCount.name: randomDataCount
randomDataCount.description: The number of random data items to generate into an array
randomDataCount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Number of Items to Generate | 作用: The number of random data items to generate into an array | 默认值: 10

randomDataSingleArray.name: randomDataSingleArray
randomDataSingleArray.description: Whether to output a single array instead of multiple items
randomDataSingleArray.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output as Single Array | 作用: Whether to output a single array instead of multiple items | 默认值: False
